stylist.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who cuts or arranges people’s hair as their job
stylist.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Renee was the top stylist at the salon.
stylist.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who has carefully developed a good style of writing
stylist.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who has their own typical way of singing or playing music
stylist.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Billie Holiday, one of jazz’s most distinctive stylists
